argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tgpt1.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_haust1 | |- ( J e. Haus -> J e. Fre ) |
| 3 |  | #P_tgpgrp | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_grpidcl | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( 0g ` G ) e. ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( 0g ` G ) e. ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 4 | #P_tgptopon | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> J e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` G ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_toponuni | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( Base ` G ) = U. J ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( Base ` G ) = U. J ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( 0g ` G ) e. U. J ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- U. J = U. J |
| 13 | 12 | #P_t1sncld | |- ( ( J e. Fre /\ ( 0g ` G ) e. U. J ) -> { ( 0g ` G ) } e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_expcom | |- ( ( 0g ` G ) e. U. J -> ( J e. Fre -> { ( 0g ` G ) } e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( J e. Fre -> { ( 0g ` G ) } e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
| 16 | 5, 1 | #P_tgphaus | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( J e. Haus <-> { ( 0g ` G ) } e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_sylibrd | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( J e. Fre -> J e. Haus ) ) |
| 18 | 2, 17 | #P_impbid2 | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( J e. Haus <-> J e. Fre ) ) |
